txt.en: Destroyed ritual tomes within Bâr Nírnaeth.
Ritual tomes can be found in Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation.\n\nYou should destroy the ritual tomes.

You have successfully destroyed the ritual tomes within Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation, and have done a great service to all those working to reclaim Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.

'Many horrors lie in wait within Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation. If you are to venture inside, I ask you to destroy the ritual tomes within. The pages of these tomes have been used in unspeakable tortures of the mind and the flesh. They must be destroyed.'
There is much for the White Company to accomplish in reclaiming Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
